title: Galilee
summary: Galilee (/ˈɡælɪliː/;[1] Hebrew: הַגָּלִיל‎, romanized: ha-galil; Arabic: الجليل‎, romanized: al-jalīl) is a region located in northern Israel and southern Lebanon. Galilee traditionally refers to the mountainous part, divided into Upper Galilee (הגליל העליון, ha-galil ha-elyon; الجليل الأعلى, al-jalīl al-a'alaa) and Lower Galilee (גליל תחתון, galil tahton; الجليل الأسفل, al-jalīl al-asfal).
